title: Sadako and the Thousand Paper Cranes by Eleanor Coerr: A Multicultural Novel Study Unit
description: Sadako was a Japanese girl who lived in Hiroshima during the Second World War. Several years later, it is discovered that she has leukemia. While in the hospital Chizuko brings her a golden paper crane and tells her the legend of the crane. Novel by Eleanor Coerr. Reproducible chapter questions, plus comprehension questions, a story summary, author biography, creative and cross curricular activities, complete with answer key.
author: Melanie Komar
